name: Mama's Time
description:
Explore an exciting world of dreams where Mama chases and babies are collected.

In this horrific game your goal is to collect a certain amount of nesting dolls as Mama attempts to find you.

There is a couple of puzzles involved as well as some exploration.

The game is not fully finished because it was made in a week for the #WeeklyGameJam Please check it out and tell me what you think.
If there is enouph support and want for more, I will work on it.

#WGJGame
